DOC.brief_summary: To prospectively evaluate efficacy real-time 3D CT-image guidance CO2 portography transjugular intrahepatic portosystemic shunt ( TIPS ) creation .
DOC.brief_title: 3D CT Guidance Transjugular Intrahepatic Portosystemic Shunt Creation
DOC.criteria: 1 . Cirrhosis 2 . Scheduled indicated TIPS procedure 1 . Presence portal vein thrombosis 2 . Presence ascites 3 . Presence hepatic vein occlusion stenosis 4 . Proven malignancy include hepatocellular carcinoma 5 . Endstage renal disease renal replacement therapy ; 6 . Cardiorespiratory failure 7 . Pregnancy patient give informed consent TIPS procedure
